lead_paragraph: New York Giants wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. has been fined $24,309 by the NFL for taking off his helmet during a touchdown celebration last Sunday against Baltimore.

headline.print_headline: Giants' Beckham Fined $24K for Taking Helmet Off After TD
headline.main: Giants' Beckham Fined $24K for Taking Helmet Off After TD
